word:
My birthday comes upon the Sabbath. This gives me a most excellent 

                                    -45- 

opportunity to reflect upon the goodness and mercies of God to spare my life so many years to engage heartily in the work which He has given me to do.--Ms 60, 1910, p. 1. (Diary fragment--1910, November 26, 1910.) 

Released July 8, 1968.
